casebody.data:
David HATCHIGIAN, Petitioner
v.
Raymond QUAGLIA, Regina Quaglia, Arnold Dranoff, Dranoff & Patrizio, P.C., Steve Leventhal, Reger, Rizzo, & Darnall LLP, Travelers, Farmington Ins. Co., Respondents No. 345 EAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 18th day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Petition for Leave to File Reply in Support of Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
